title: Electrostatic interaction bridges the charge transport kinetics and high-temperature capacitive energy storage performance of polymer dielectrics
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,7627-7648
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02371D, Review Article
Minhao Yang, Yanlong Zhao, Huarui Yan, Zepeng Wang, Chao Xu, Chong Zhang, Emiliano Bilotti, Jianying Li, Zhi-Min Dang
Charge transport in polymer dielectrics can be regulated by constructing a strong electrostatic interaction. Attraction introduces deep traps to restrain charge mobility but repulsion augments the barrier height to scatter the charges.
